mapper.select: SELECT C.tenant_id, B.system_id, B.authKey_use_yn, A.auth_key, A.auth_key_cd, A.issu_dt, A.expr_dt, C.status_cd as ten_status_cd, B.status_cd as sys_status_cd, A.status_cd as ath_status_cd FROM tb_cm_auth_key A LEFT OUTER JOIN tb_cm_system B ON A.system_id = B.system_id LEFT OUTER JOIN tb_cm_tenant C ON B.tenant_id = C.tenant_id WHERE A.auth_key = #{authKey}
SELECT A.system_id, A.interface_id, A.status_cd FROM tb_cm_auth A INNER JOIN tb_cm_interface B ON A.interface_id = B.interface_id WHERE A.system_id = #{systemId} AND B.url = #{url}
